text: Thick, full eyebrows add definition to the eyes and upper portion of the face; but if you've gotten tweezer-happy or your eyebrows are naturally thin, you may be in need of a boost. While you can use an eyebrow pencil to add some faux brow hairs, you may find it doesn't look as natural as you'd like. With just a bit of effort and a few beauty tricks, you can help your eyebrows grow in thicker.
title: Can You Increase Eyebrow Hair?
